feed.title: Dokploy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.17.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feat/add error logs remote server by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1180
  • fix: turnoff cleanup cache by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1182

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.17.7...v0.17.8

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.17.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(template): add alist template by @yni9ht in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1183
  • style: fix incosistent spacing in Card-Footer by @RoodyCode in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1185
  • feat(i18n): add missing keys to Russian translation by @gentslava in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1186
  • feat: restore domain dropdown menu functionality by @vishalkadam47 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1193
  • feat: add spacedrive file manager template by @vishalkadam47 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1194
  • feat(template): added maybe finance by @bernabedev in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1195
  • fix(ui): add condition to show update server button to admin only by @rahadi23 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1196
  • fix: terminal paste visibility by @vishalkadam47 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1203
  • fix: Multiple Preview Deployments by @gentslava in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1204
  • fix(template): prepend superset_ to postgres/redis by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1205
  • feat: add erpnext template by @NagariaHussain in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1214
  • fix: search by name and not on url by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1215
  • refactor: add dokploy-network on new installations to prevent gatewayâ€¦ by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1216
  • refactor: make less aggressive cleanups by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1217
  • refactor: adjust order by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1218
  • fix: set extracted port on ssh connection by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1219
  • refactor: add back delete with confirmation by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1221
  • refactor: add server IP address by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1222
  • feat(template): added answer template by @bernabedev in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1220
  • Fix/remove cron jobs after delete by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1223
  • feat: add DOKPLOY_DEPLOY_URL in enviroment variables for previews by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1224

New Contributors

  • @yni9ht made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1183
  • @RoodyCode made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1185
  • @gentslava made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1186
  • @NagariaHussain made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1214

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.17.8...v0.17.9

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.18.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(template): added shlink, a url shortener service by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1226
  • fix(template): shlink version stable in index.ts by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1229
  • feat: upgrade listmonk version by @jannismilz in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1231
  • fix: teable template by @muhammetakalan in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1232
  • feat(template): added evolution api by @joaotonaco in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1114
  • feat(template): add Formbricks template with Docker Compose and environment setup by @bernabedev in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1237
  • Feat: added env support to Dokploy stack compose by @xenonwellz in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/637
  • chore: remove duplicated sentence in projects dialog by @MuhammadM1998 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1250
  • feat: added clipboard functionality to copy IP address from badge in services pages by @vishalkadam47 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1238
  • feat: Updated PocketBase version to 0.25.0 by @Blueshadow58 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1259
  • fix: improve domains page UX and button placement consistency by @ali-issa in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1249
  • fix: expose docker stack services by @mateodemuynck in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1252
  • refactor: update docker stats by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1262
  • fix: don't cut log by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1264
  • refactor: delete label by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1265
  • Feat/monitoring cloud version by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1267
  • Fix/monitoring by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1271
  • fix(template): superset SQLALCHEMY_EXAMPLES_URI env + warning by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1269
  • chore: update unsend image version to v1.2.5 by @mohabgabber in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1268

New Contributors

  • @jannismilz made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1231
  • @muhammetakalan made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1232
  • @xenonwellz made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/637
  • @MuhammadM1998 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1250
  • @Blueshadow58 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1259
  • @ali-issa made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1249
  • @mateodemuynck made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1252

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.17.9...v0.18.0
